btv.download.utils

Class ByteCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • btv.download.utils.ByteCalculator

  • public class ByteCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a simple class which will return a string representing how many bytes are in the given form e.g 1 -> 1byte 1024 -> 1 kb etc... Author: Stephan McLean Date: 16th March.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ByteCalculator() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String convert(java.lang.String bytes)
      Convert a String containing a number of bytes to a String representing that number in either bytes, kilobytes, megabytes or gigabytes.

      • convert

        public static java.lang.String convert(java.lang.String bytes)
        Convert a String containing a number of bytes to a String representing that number in either bytes, kilobytes, megabytes or gigabytes.
        Parameters:
        bytes - The number of bytes to format.
        Returns:
        The formatted String as described before.
